function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent opening and closing of windows and doors during experiments","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Limit unnecessary opening of windows and doors, use air purifiers indoors","Technologies":"Air purifiers, automatic window and door closers","People":"Occupants of the house, neighboring buildings","Owner":"Residents, researchers, building management"},{"Description":"Lack of measurement of outdoor and indoor temperatures and wind speed during air change experiments","Impact":"Inability to assess the impact of outdoor conditions on indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Use of advanced environmental monitoring equipment, conduct thorough data collection during experiments","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring sensors, data loggers","People":"Researchers, environmental specialists","Owner":"Research team, environmental monitoring specialists"},{"Description":"Collection of wind data at a height of 3.05 m in the backyard only","Impact":"Limited understanding of outdoor wind patterns near the house","Mitigation":"Install additional wind sensors at different heights around the house, analyze wind patterns from multiple locations","Technologies":"Multiple wind sensors, computational fluid dynamics modeling","People":"Researchers, environmental specialists","Owner":"Research team, environmental monitoring specialists"}]}
